items.name: Helm of Iron Will
items.lore: Wrought from enchanted alloys, this helm grants the wearer unyielding defense against physical onslaughts

items.name: Ring of Illumination
items.lore: Embraced by the light's grace, this ring fortifies the spirit against the encroaching shadows

items.name: Shadowbane Amulet
items.lore: A mystical talisman woven from ancient obsidian, providing protection against the sinister forces of darkness

items.name: Frostguard Gauntlets
items.lore: These gauntlets, crafted from the essence of ice, ward off the bitter chill and shield the hands from frosty harm.

items.name: Flameheart Belt
items.lore: Imbued with the essence of fire, this belt grants the wearer resilience against scorching flames

items.name: Tempeststride Boots
items.lore: Fashioned from stormy essence, these boots ground the wearer against the electric dance of thunderous fury
